text: She's known for baring her soul in hilarious comedic routines. But Amy Schumer seemingly kept her friends and family in the dark leading up to her secretive nuptials in Malibu, Calif., on Feb. 13, according to US Weekly. The 36 - year - old actress reportedly notified guests of her wedding to Chris Fischer just two days before the pair's'very laid - back'beach - side vows.
